segments.text: Madison Suites , how may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'm calling from Mexico . I will be in town next week and would like to know if you have availability .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK ma'am , can you tell me the date you expect to check in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , July ninth . I will be there for seven nights .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have a junior single suite or a superior double suite available for those dates .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The junior suite is smaller and has one twin bed , while the superior suite has a double bed and mini-bar .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I would like to reserve the superior suite . Is breakfast included ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , a buffet breakfast is served every morning . I will need your name and your credit card details in order to complete the reservation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , my credit card number is ...
segments.speaker: S2
